typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Validation_Flag as string,
		Transaction_Date as date,
		Related_Parties_Involved as string,
		Transaction_Description as string,
		Transaction_Size_Value as decimal(19,4),
		How_Managed as string,
		How_does_the_transaction_benefit_both_parties as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Work_Book as string,
		Work_Sheet as string,
		Process_Name as string,
		CurrentReportingPeriod as date,
		RowNumber as long,
		AssetReportingDateValidateMsg as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceReadyLoad
SourceReadyLoad select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Transaction_Date,
		Related_Parties_Involved,
		Transaction_Description,
		Transaction_Size_Value,
		How_Managed,
		How_does_the_transaction_benefit_both_parties,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		CurrentReportingPeriod,
		RowNumber,
		AssetReportingDateValidateMsg
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> MapColumns
MapColumns sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Transaction_ID_Old as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Transaction_Date as date,
		Related_Parties_Involved as string,
		Transaction_Description as string,
		Transaction_Size as decimal(19,4),
		How_Managed as string,
		Mutual_Benefit as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string,
		Transaction_ID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Transaction_Date,
		Related_Parties_Involved,
		Transaction_Description,
		Transaction_Size = Transaction_Size_Value,
		How_Managed,
		Mutual_Benefit = How_does_the_transaction_benefit_both_parties,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetRelational
